sentences.en: But it's a combative form. of fighting.
sentences.cn: 但它是一战斗中好斗的形式.

sentences.en: Congress is in a combative mood.
Daniels is at his best when he's cool and direct, rather than combative and polemical.
sentences.cn: 丹尼尔斯冷静、坦率时状态最佳；而好斗、爱辩时则不然。

sentences.en: He conducted the meeting in his usual combative style, refusing to admit any mistakes.
sentences.cn: 他主持会议的时候仍旧显示出一贯的好辩作风，拒绝承认任何错误。

sentences.en: He is inflexible, unbending and combative.
sentences.cn: 他是不屈不饶的和好战的.

sentences.en: He is still on the nervous edge of energy, tense, temperish, combative.
sentences.cn: 他仍然处于那种按捺不住的神经质状态, 紧张, 急躁, 好斗.

sentences.en: Her indifference aroused perhaps his combative soul.
sentences.cn: 她的冷若冰霜也许激起了他好胜的灵魂.

sentences.en: Her prettiness, wax - like in its quality, fascinated him; her indifference aroused perhaps his combative soul.
sentences.cn: 她的美貌,白晰脂润的美质迷住了他, 她的冷若冰霜也许又激动了他好胜的灵魂.

sentences.en: Now the gloves are coming off and they are taking up a much more combative stance.
sentences.cn: 现在,中国企业脱下了拳击手套,摆出更加好斗的架势.

sentences.en: Obama has offered to ease relations if Iran down its combative rhetoric.
sentences.cn: 奥巴马已主动提出如果伊朗缓和激进好战的言辞的话,他会改善关系.

sentences.en: She believes that women are at least as combative as are.
sentences.cn: 她相信女性至少和男性一样好斗.

sentences.en: The combative young midfielder - calmly a deserved victory, capping an impressive - all - round display in style.
sentences.cn: 这位斗志昂扬的年轻中场射门的时候很冷静,综合的表现也非常不错.这场胜利曼联也是实至名归.

sentences.en: Try disagreeing with me when I'm manic and I'm evil ; I become quite combative.
sentences.cn: ‘不信你在我躁狂发作时跟我 顶牛 试试---我会不管不顾,变得非常好斗. ’

sentences.en: Try not to become combative and defensive when you are being criticized.
sentences.cn: 当你被人批评时,试着别好斗或过分防卫.

sentences.en: Video frequency demonstration: Dead Lin Songling displays fierce truly combative, the aggressivity is very strong.
sentences.cn: 视频显示: 死者林松岭确实表现得凶猛好斗, 攻击性很强.

sentences.en: Well, bottlenose dolphins can be aggressive – and combative!
sentences.cn: 好的, 宽吻海豚可能具侵略性–而且好斗!

trans.tran_en: ready and willing to fight or argue
